entry.string: The Google Search module incorporates the Google API to allow google searches to be performed from your site. This module holds the same constraints that Google places on the API, and as such much is not configurable at this time (number of results is limited to 10). You must register with Google.com to get an API Key. You are limited to 1000 queries against the API a day.
entry.translation: Zee Guugle-a Seerch mudoole-a incurpuretes zee Guugle-a EPI tu elloo guugle-a seerches tu be-a perffurmed frum yuoor seete-a. Thees mudoole-a hulds zee seme-a cunstreeents thet Guugle-a pleces oon zee EPI, und es sooch mooch is nut cunffeegooreble-a et thees teeme-a (noomber ooff resoolts is leemited tu 10). Yuoo moost regeester veet Guugle-a.cum tu get un EPI Key. Bork bork bork! Yuoo ere-a leemited tu 1000 qooereees egeeenst zee EPI a dey.

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice. "Modify Configuration".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a. "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun".

entry.string: Modify Configuration -- Allows you to update the global configuration for the module.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun -- Elloos yuoo tu updete-a zee glubel cunffeegooreshun fur zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: The Google Search module can be hooked into the Search module to provide search results when searching.
entry.translation: Zee Guugle-a Seerch mudoole-a cun be-a huuked intu zee Seerch mudoole-a tu prufeede-a seerch resoolts vhee seercheeng.
